briefTitle: Assessment of Long-term Safety in Patients With Non-cancer-related Pain and Opioid-induced Constipation
officialTitle: An Open-Label 52-week Study to Assess the Long-Term Safety of NKTR-118 in Opioid-Induced Constipation (OIC) in Patients With Non-Cancer-Related Pain
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of NKTR-118 treatment of opioid-induced constipation (OIC) in patients with non-cancer-related pain.

primaryOutcome.measure: Incidence of Patients Experiencing at Least One Adverse Event (AE)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline (Week 0) to end of the follow-up period
